```{r, results="asis", echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(glue)
library(dplyr)
feed_dat_kela <- readRDS("../../local_data/feed_dat_kela.RDS") %>% 
  select(date,item_title,item_description,item_link,item_authors)
feed_dat_fimea <- readRDS("../../local_data/feed_dat_fimea.RDS") %>% 
  select(date,item_title,item_description,item_link,item_authors)

feed_dat_kela %>% 
  arrange(desc(date)) %>% 
  slice(1:8) %>% 
  mutate(html = glue('
  <dl class="row">
  <dd class="col-sm-12"><div class = "yellow-line">{date}</div>
  <a class = "laake-link" href="{item_link}">{item_title}<i class="bi-chevron-right"></i></a> 
  
  <!--strong>{item_authors}</strong><br/-->
  </dd></dl>')) %>% 
  pull(html) -> feed_lines_kela

feed_dat_fimea %>% 
  arrange(desc(date)) %>% 
  slice(1:8) %>% 
  mutate(html = glue('
  <dl class="row">
  <dd class="col-sm-12"><div class = "yellow-line">{date}</div>
  <a class = "laake-link" href="{item_link}">{item_title}<i class="bi-chevron-right"></i></a>
  <!--strong>{item_authors}</strong><br/-->
  <!--i>{item_description}<a href="{item_link}"> Lue lisää</a></i-->
  </dd></dl>')) %>% 
  pull(html) -> feed_lines_fimea

feed_lines <- c('<dl class="row"><div class = "col-sm-6"><img src = "layout_set_logo.png" height  = "30px"><div style = "padding-top: 10px;"></div><h5>Uutta Kelan tutkimusblogissa</h5>',
                feed_lines_kela,
                '<!--a href = "https://tutkimusblogi.kela.fi/avainsanat/laakkeet">Lue lisää Kelan tutkimusblogista</a-->
                </div>',
                '<div class = "col-sm-6"><img src = "https://www.fimea.fi/o/fimea-theme/images/logo/fimea-logo.svg" height  = "30px"><div style = "padding-top: 10px;"></div><h5>Ajankohtaista Fimeasta</h5>',
                feed_lines_fimea,
                '<!--a href = "https://www.fimea.fi/tietoa_fimeasta/ajankohtaista/uutiset">Lue lisää Fimean kotisivuilta</a-->
                </div>',
                '</dl>
<hr>'
                )

cat(feed_lines)
```
